about_the_game:
Step into the ULTIMATE BAKING ADVENTURE!

As the new star baker of Pleasantville bakery, you'll create scrumptious breads, perfect pastries, and delightful donuts. But there's more than just baking – you'll also meet a flurry of flirty customers. Wink and smile your way through playful relationships as you serve up your tasty creations.

COMPLETE FLIRTY MINIGAMES

Dive into exciting mini-games, keep your bakery spotless, and tackle unexpected baking challenges. And let's not forget your adorable bakery pet who's always there to cheer you on! Your goal? Make your bakery the go-to spot in town for delicious treats and charming conversations. Time to mix, mingle, and bake!



BECOME AN ARTISAN BAKER

Become an 5-star artisan baker by crafting a variety of baked goods such as croissants, pretzels, various breads, muffins, and more. Revel in the satisfaction of baking from scratch! Unlock new recipes and even bake custom creations - some combinations will taste better than others, so it's time to get creative!

Keep your customers happy

Deliver your customer's orders with swift service and with a smile. Some customers have less patience than others, so it's up to you to get their order to them in time and watch their love for you and your baked creations grow. Watch your profits soar as you become the go-to bakery in town.



COMPLETE HUGE CATERING ORDERS FOR CLIENTS

Take on large-scale catering orders and master the art of working under pressure. Meet tight deadlines to cater for special events and large gatherings - if you do well, your reputation as the best baker in town will grow and unlock more challenges and more rewards.

PLAY MINIGAMES TO CHARM YOUR WAIFUS

Engage in over a dozen charming mini-games that allow you to connect with your in-game Waifus. Each mini-game leads you on a personal journey with a chosen customer, building your friendship - which could possibly lead to more! Remember to keep track of each relationship, though, because things can get complicated very quickly, and be kind - you have your reputation to think about, after all.

BE HANDY WITH A TOOL

Keep your bakery in top shape by repairing machinery, fixing leaks, and ensuring everything operates smoothly to avoid any downtime. Unfortunate events can happen anytime, so you will have to be on the top of your game to overcome them whilst still providing service on time, and with a smile.



OVERCOME DISASTORS!

Sharpen your problem-solving skills by quickly dealing with unexpected bakery mishaps like burnt bakes or small fires - stay calm and keep baking! Tackle the challenge of keeping your bakery hygienic and rat-free, especially with the looming threat of food hygiene inspections.

AIM FOR THE STARS

Elevate your bakery's rating to five stars to unlock advanced machinery, attract more customers, and expand your bakery empire to new heights!

movies.name: Super Waifu Bakery Simulator Gameplay Trailer

name: Super Waifu Bakery Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2100 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-2550K, 3.4 GHz or AMD
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or Radeon R9 290X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Launch and manage your own bakery, crafting artisanal goods, satisfying customers, handling crises, and striving for five-star excellence, all while enjoying mini-games and flirtatious encounters!
